issue.title: [Python] Fix typos

comments.body:

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7468?focusedCommentId=17002630) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
`[~kiszk]` FYI: You can set yourself to "Assignee" by yourself when you will open a pull request. And you don't need to set not released version ("1.0.0" for this case) to "Affects Version/s".
